root.name: Fantastic 4
root.description: Although it is called Fantastic 4, the game is only 2 players. Story Like any game based on a movie, the story is only loosely based on the movie. In the game, there are battles against Mole Man, Diablo, Dragon Man, Blastaar, Annihilus Puppetmaster, in addition to Dr. Doom. UnlockablesThere is also an additional classic mission featuring an entirely different voice cast.

similar_games.game: X-Men: Legends II - Rise of Apocalypse
